sentences.sentence: Traders of other time frames can use scalping as a supplementary approach in several ways.
sentences.translation: 交易员在其他时间内可以利用刷单作为一种补充办法，有几个方面。

sentences.sentence: The new policy which started today, aims to improve railway security and stop ticket scalping.
sentences.translation: 这项新的政策于今天开始实施，是为了提高铁路安全问题和阻止倒票行为。

sentences.sentence: It is also said to be effective in curbing scalping, especially during the Spring Festival period.
sentences.translation: 据说，它也能够有效地遏制倒票，尤其是在春节期间。
